source.citation: From: Walsh, N.G. (1994). Poaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 2. Ferns and Allied Plants, Conifers and Monocotyledons. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Spikelets distinctly 2-ranked along one side only of axis of inflorescence
Spikelets arranged all around axis of inflorescence
Hairs on lower margins and dorsal surface of lemma club-shaped, dilated and rounded near apex
Hairs on lower margins of lemma truncate to acute but not dilated near apex, dorsal surface of lemma glabrous
